title: Marry Me Steak
instructions: Season planted.steak with salt, pepper, and Italian herbs. Sear in a hot skillet with olive oil for 3-4 minutes per side until golden. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, saut√© minced garlic and sun-dried tomatoes for 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in vegetable broth and heavy cream, bring to a simmer. Add a generous handful of fresh spinach and stir until wilted.
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Return the seared steak to the pan and spoon the creamy sauce over it. Simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve immediately over pasta or with crusty bread.
